description: When Bingo Wilkin isn't playing in his band, The Bingoes, he's just an average teenage boy, in love with the girl next door -- the super-strong Samantha Smythe. Her father, Sampson, sure wishes he wasn't, though! Bingo's rambunctious, clumsy antics are a sight to behold -- he can be a real handful. Check out the crazy antics of Bingo and his silly friends in this 150-page Digital Exclusive!
name: Jughead's Cousin That Wilkin Boy

description: Ginger Snapp is a boy-crazy teenage girl who just wants to have fun! Whether she's on a date with her nerdy on-and-off boyfriend, Ickky, or going on a date with gridiron hunk Whiz Baker, there's always bound to be some romantic mayhem! Hang out with America's sassy sweetheart in this 50-page Digital Exclusive!
name: Ginger Sweetheart of A Nation

description: Look out, world -- Seymour is on the scene! Join this crazy kid and his poor frustrated father in an inside look on the life of a "typical" teenage boy. With his head in the clouds, the ever-clumsy Seymour leaves chaos in his wake wherever he goes! Whether he's causing calamity in chemistry class, concocting a culinary catastrophe in the cafeteria or friskily flirting with the French teacher, Seymour's days are never boring! Read up on a typical day for one of the most atypical teens around in this Digital Exclusive.
name: Seymour, My Son The Complete Series

description: What were Archie and the gang like when they were children? Now you can find out! Join Little Archie, Betty, Veronica, Jughead and more in this BIG digital exclusive about some little kids! Even in elementary school, the gang was causing trouble and making everyone laugh. From playing pretend with friends to facing off with the evil Mad Doctor Doom, there's something for everyone in this 150-page Digital Exclusive!
name: Little Archie and Friends

description: Ho ho h-oh, boy! It's the most wonderful time of the year once again! Archie and the gang are doing the last of their Christmas shopping and decking the halls in this yuletide Digital Exclusive. Can Archie get his Christmas decorating done in time for the big day? Will Reggie get his name taken off Santa's Naughty List? And don't miss guest appearances by Jingles the Elf, Sugarplum the Fairy, and ol' St. Nick himself! This 100-page Digital Exclusive will make the perfect stocking stuffer for your new mobile device.
name: Archie's Christmas Spirit

description: Katy Keene, model/actress/singer extraordinaire, has been an inspiration for the fashion-conscious for years! Now, Archie Comics is pleased to bring you a digital-exclusive collection of some of Katy's most wonderful stories -- and outfits! Katy certainly has her hands full with the Hollywood lifestyle she has. Glitz and glamour, famous boyfriends and runway rivals, and her little sister, Sis, is quite a balancing act! Can she keep it together and keep her fans wowed? Find out in this Digital Exclusive!
name: Katy Keene America's Pin-Up Queen

description: For Archie Andrews, the perfect Christmas gift is a smooch under the mistletoe! Archie, Betty, Veronica and the gang are back with more holiday shenanigans to make the season jolly. When you read this 100-page collection of fantastic Christmas stories, you're sure to be on Santa's Good List-it's impossible to cry or pout when you're laughing this hard!
name: Betty & Veronica Under the Mistletoe

description: Wilbur Wilkin is a goofy blond teen that can't help but get into trouble with the ladies! Caught up in his own little love triangle, he leans towards his sweetheart, Laurie -- much to Linda's disappointment! Can Wilbur choose between the girls for good, or will Wilbur's many rivals get in his way? Find out in this 50-page Digital Exclusive!
name: Wilbur America's Son of Fun

description: Before she was a part of Josie & the Pussycats, she was just Josie! See how this world-famous rock star started out -- as an average high school teen! With her BFFs, the ditzy Melody and the quick and witty Pepper, Josie gets caught up in all sorts of misadventures. Check out this 100-page Digital Exclusive and meet her boyfriend Albert, the rotten Cabot twins Alex and Alexandra, and many more!
name: She's Josie

description: Archie Comics is proud to present Pat the Brat, little kid that's a BIG pain! Pat makes a surprising menace of himself time and time again for his poor parents. How much trouble can one kid get into? And will he be able to get out of it! Find out in over 50 pages of classic comic fun!
name: Pat the Brat

description: Archie comics are hilarious. So are monkeys. What happens when they're mixed together? Stories so good you'll go bananas! We're up to some serious monkey business in this 100-page digital exclusive, collecting our most outrageous primate pranks! What happens when Archie tries to bring a monkey home as a pet? Watch what happens when an ape goes ape over Josie and the Pussycats' drummer, Melody! Then, Sabrina's magic goes haywire and things get a little hairy! Grab a seat on your favorite tire swing and enjoy!
name: Archie & Friends Monkey Madness!

description: The best part about having a best friend is having fun! Nobody knows that better than Betty and Veronica, Riverdale's famous BFFs! Not even Archie can tear these two apart -- we think! Join in on the celebration of these girls' inseparable bond with this 150+ page digital exclusive. These stories are bound to make you laugh, cry, smile, and remember the power of friendship.
name: Betty & Veronica Friendship Fun

description: Go long! Like, 150 pages long! It's football season and the Riverdale Bulldogs are ready to take the field. Can quarterback Archie throw the game-winning pass? Find out in this Digital Exclusive collection of Archie Comics' best football stories! Every one of 'em is a touchdown -- just be sure you don't spike this reading device with glee!
name: Archie Gridiron Glory

description: They're HOT. They're COOL. And they're YOURS, in over 100 pages of winter fun! They may not be Olympic-level athletes, but Betty & Veronica can ski, skate, and snowboard with the best of 'em! Join these queens of the ice in 100 pages of winter sports and games that are so funny they'll curl your hair! With friends like this, you can't luge!
name: Betty & Veronica Go For the Gold

description: Is it better to have and lost than to never have loved at all? Ask the gang -- but watch out for thrown objects! In this mega-sized 200-page digital exclusive, we examine the rocky relationships of Archie and his friends. What happens when eyes wander and romance goes awry? DRAMA DRAMA DRAMA! Hold onto your hats, folks -- some hearts are about to get broken!
name: Archie & Friends Heartbreakers

description: SAY WHAT?! Could Riverdale's most dedicated bachelor really be falling for a girl? That's right, folks -- just in time for Valentine's Day, Jughead Jones gets bitten by the love bug! Read up on over 150 pages of Jughead's love connections in this digital exclusive collection. Will our favorite human vacuum ever be the same?!
name: Jughead In Love?!

description: In honor of the 70th anniversary of Pop's Choklit Shoppe, Archie Comics is proud to present a collection of stories featuring the hippest spot in Riverdale. The Choklit Shoppe and it's owner, Pop Tate, first appeared in Pep Comics #46 in 1944. Since then, it's been a major cornerstone in the Archie universe, serving as the perfect meeting place, date location, and home away from home. Celebrate the best diner in Riverdale with over 200 pages of stories, pin-ups, behind-the-scenes features and more!
name: Archie At the Choklit Shoppe

description: It's time to shop 'til you drop with Betty and Veronica! Whether you're looking for the perfect birthday gift for a friend or the perfect pair of shoes for yourself, there's just one place to go -- the mall! This digital exclusive collects over 100 pages of one-stop shopping at the famous Riverdale Mall! Will Betty find the deal of the century? Will Veronica wear out her credit cards? Crack open that piggy bank and find out!
name: Betty & Veronica Mall Princesses

description: If you had been to as many school dances as Archie and friends, you'd be an All-Star dancer, too! Lace up your tap shoes and cut a rug with Archie, Betty, Veronica and the gang in a collection of our most spectacular dance stories! From school dances to competitions and everything in-between, these teens have ants in their pants (figuratively, not literally)! Read 100 pages of booty-shaking stories and see why the Archie crew owns the dance floor!
name: Dancing With the Archies

description: Betty and Veronica may be BFFs, but they're not the only ones! Riverdale's also home to a bunch of guys who pal around and watch each other's backs. Archie and Jughead, Moose and Dilton, Reggie and... Reggie..? These dynamic duos are so off-the-wall they have to be seen to be believed! Hang out with the boys in this 100-page digital exclusive book and see why these best friends are the best!
name: Archie & Friends Bro-Mances

description: Oh, brother (or sister)! Family sure can be a handful -- especially if you're talking about your sibling! You may argue, fight, and drive each other crazy, but for better or worse, you're stuck with 'em! Betty, Polly and their brother Chic all get along now, but did they always? Jughead's baby sister Jellybean is cute as a button, but sure can be tough to babysit! And what other Riverdale residents have siblings you may not have met yet? Join in on some fraternal fun with Archie and the gang as they celebrate one of the closest bonds around -- a brother or sister!
name: Archie & Friends Sibling Rivalry

description: Riverdale High's Clown Prince of Pranks is back and ready to flip the town on its ear! Follow Reggie's path of destruction as he uses every prank in his arsenal -- from the oldest tricks in the book to the craziest stunts imaginable! Who will his victims be this time? There are a lot of 'em -- this digital exclusive book contains over 100 pages! Keep your eyes peeled for the Mantle mayhem!
name: Reggie King of April Fools: 2

description: FORE! Archie and friends are hitting the links for a relaxing game -- that was the plan, at least! Have you ever seen them play golf? They're dangerous! Join Archie, Betty, Veronica, and Jughead as they slice their way though 18 holes and 100 pages of golf gaffs guaranteed to get you to guffaw! Mr. Lodge's country club will never be the same. Keep your head down and enjoy this digital exclusive collection!
name: Archie & Friends The Gold Club

description: Get outside and enjoy the sunshine with Betty and Veronica! Riverdale's parks are the first in friendship, and what better way to celebrate than spend the day with B & V? This 200-page digital exclusive collects some of the girls' best outdoor adventures. Could there be anything better than that? Nope!
name: Betty & Veronica Parks & Recreation

description: Archie's car has been a staple of Archie Comics since the beginning -- and it's been a lemon for just as long! Even back in the Roarin' 40's, Archie's jalopy was in a constant state of disrepair, much to the chagrin of his friends! While it may not be reliable, it sure creates some hilarious situations for Archie! Join us as we present over 100 pages of car capers as only the Archie art team can tell. This book is a digital exclusive, too-perfect for long car trips!
name: Archie's Jalopy

description: Brush up on your art fundamentals with the Riverdale gang! Archie, Betty, Veronica, Chuck and the gang are painting the town red -- literally! Check out some of Riverdale's most colorful characters expressing themselves through art. They'll try their hand at sculpture, painting, drawing, and more in 50 pages of fun! Get ready --these stories are so funny they could make Mona Lisa laugh!
name: Archie & Friends Art Smarts

description: Do you feel the need -- the need for speed? Archie and friends do, and they're putting the pedal to the metal in this new digital exclusive! Watch as Archie, Betty, Veronica and the gang climb into the driver's seat and burn rubber. This digital exclusive book contains 70 pages of hilarious racing stories. Left turns have never been so funny!
name: Archie & Friends Need For Speed

description: When school lets out for the summer, sometimes your allowance can't cover everything you want to do. The solution: Get a job! The Riverdale crew is rolling up their sleeves and going to work in this 100-page digital exclusive. Can Archie find a summer job? Can Jughead keep his summer job? And Veronica has a summer job?! You can't miss the nutty antics of these workplace weirdoes!
name: B&V Friends Get A Job

description: Ladies and gentlemen, pals and gals! It's time for The Greatest Book on Earth! The circus is in town for Archie and friends, which means things are crazier than usual! Join the usual Riverdale clowns as they bumble through the big tent in this 100-page digital exclusive. As a special bonus, we've included Archie's 1st ever appearance, where his dreams of becoming a tightrope walker fall flat! Don't miss it!
name: Big Top Archie

description: The families of Riverdale are getting together again for a family reunion! Join the party with Archie, Betty, Veronica, Jughead and more in this digital exclusive book! Have you met Archie's British cousin, Alistair? How about Ronnie's truck-driving Aunt Gladys? And what kind of nuts grow on Jughead's family tree?! With over 120 pages of content, you can become part of the family, too!
name: Archie & Friends Family Reunion

description: Mr. Lodge may be the richest man in Riverdale, but he faces one major problem that could change that -- his own daughter! Veronica's credit cards are the solution to everything, and she's got her Daddykins wrapped around her little finger. When he does put her in her place, though, it's on an epic scale! Will this Daddy/Daughter duo get along without driving each other crazy? Or will Archie drive them both crazy first? Find out in this 100-page digital exclusive!
name: Veronica's Daddy Issues

description: Take the field with the Riverdale High soccer team! Archie, Jughead, Betty and Veronica are lacing up their cleats and getting ready for the big match! Join the gang as they play the world's most popular sport in 100 pages of fun. Will Archie be able to score the winning goal? You'll only find out in this digital exclusive collection!
name: World of Archie Soccer Stars

description: Get your towels ready, 'cause Betty and Veronica are hitting the deck! Take a ride on Veronica's personal yacht and explore the deep blue sea. Put on your swim trunks and flip-flops for 50 pages of nautical nonsense, only available digitally!
name: Betty & Veronica On A Boat

description: The robots are coming! Riverdale's resident science whiz, Dilton Doiley, has been in his laboratory, making mechanical men, and now they're on the loose! Battling bots, cleaning machines, cybernetic butlers -- you name it, Dilton's built it! Can Archie, Betty, Veronica and the gang help Dilton get these brilliant inventions under control before it's too late? Find out with 50 pages that are more than meets the eye!
name: Archie & Friends Robot Rampage!

description: With glowing hearts, Archie and friends are heading to Canada! America's neighbor to the north is a big place with a lot of cool places to explore, and the gang is ready to visit everywhere from New Brunswick to Yukon! Check out this collection of Canadian-themed stories and join in on the fun with over 70 pages of content. This special edition can ONLY be found digitally, so download yours today!
name: Archie Goes To Canada

description: Betty and Veronica are going off the deep end at their awesome pool party! Veronica's personal pool is ready for swimming, games of Marco Polo, and more -- and you're invited to the fun! Get ready for 150 pages of swimming pool shenanigans as only the Archie gang can tell 'em! This digital exclusive book is perfect for poolside reading while you work on your tan.
name: B&V Friends Pool Party

description: The ultimate battle of the sexes has begun! It's boys VS girls in Riverdale, and things are about to get crazy! Will there be any dating at all until the war is over? Who will Rule and who will Drool? Take your side and read over 150 pages of pals VS gals. This book is only available digitally, so download yours today!
name: World of Archie Pals VS Gals

description: What happens when the sun goes down in Riverdale? The fun doesn't stop, that's for sure! Music clubs, nighttime strolls, and slumber parties await you after dark with Archie and friends! Check out this cool 50-page collection of nighttime stories. The best thing of all? This digital exclusive will always be on your screen, so you can read in the dark!
name: Archie After Curfew

description: The sun is hot and so are the girls! By popular demand, we bring you the B & V Friends: Swimsuit Special! This digital exclusive book brings you 200 pages of fun on the beach! Will Betty and Veronica sport the perfect bikinis this summer? You'll have to read to find out!
name: Betty & Veronica Swimsuit Special

description: For all of Archie's typical teenage antics, he's also had his share of daring adventures! He's foiled robberies, fought off criminals, escaped life-threatening situations and more! Are you ready to join in on the adventure? Read about these thrilling tales in this 100-page digital exclusive!
name: Archie & Friends Adventures

description: Betty, Veronica, Archie and the gang have always been world-famous -- now they're seeing the world for themselves! This 150-page digital exclusive sees the girls exploring countries all over the globe. Whether they're on a Paris shopping trip or a London concert with The Archies, the fun doesn't stop! Pack a bag and join the fun today!
name: B&V Friends International

description: Riverdale High is turning into a zoo --- literally! Go on a safari with Archie and friends as they encounter all sorts of animals from across the globe. What will they learn about their furry friends? Will they be able to tame these wild animals, or will Riverdale go to the dogs (and giraffes, and elephants, and camels, etc.?) At 100 pages of content, this digital exclusive is enough to make you go wild!
name: Archie & Friends World Wide Wildlife

description: We see a lot of Archie and friends, but have you ever wondered what Mr. Weatherbee, Ms. Grundy and the Riverdale High staff do in their spare time? Wonder no more -- this 100-page digital exclusive book explores just that! Read these laugh-out-loud stories starring your favorite teachers. Class is in session, and you're about to get SCHOOLED!
name: Archie & Friends Faculty Funnies

description: Trendy, sexy, always on the cutting edge -- that's Veronica Lodge's approach to fashion! She's Riverdale High's leading fashionista, and is always eager to prove it. There's nothing she can't pull off, no matter what the cost! Let Ronnie give you her own personal runway show with over 100 pages of her hottest fashions. Can her BFF Betty even hope to compete?
name: Veronica's Hot Fashions

description: Beautiful, practical, cool clothes on a budget -- that's Betty Cooper's approach to fashion! She's Riverdale High's biggest sweetheart, and always dresses the part. No matter how small her budget is, Betty makes it work! Let Betty give you a down-to-earth fashion show with over 100 pages of her hottest fashions. Can her BFF Veronica handle not being in the spotlight?
name: Betty's Cool Fashions

description: The eternal struggle between principal and troublemaking student has been in Archie Comics for over 70 years! Now Archie and Mr. Weatherbee go head-to-head in this digital exclusive collection of their best battles! Will Archie be able to keep himself out of trouble? Will Mr. Weatherbee lose his mind dealing with Archie? This 100-page digital exclusive answers these questions and more! This makes a perfect reading experience while you're sitting in detention!
name: Archie vs Principal Weatherbee

description: School is in session -- but your school was never like this! Join Sabrina the Teenage Witch on a magical journey to witch school, where all magical secrets are kept. Brush up on your potions, get a taste of transmutations, and learn how to fly on your magic broom! This textbook-sized digital exclusive has over 150 pages of spells and stories for you to enjoy.
name: Sabrina's Magic School

description: When Mom and Dad are out and away, Betty and Veronica come to play! The girls are coming over to babysit in this new 100-page digital exclusive. Taking care of kids isn't so easy, though -- can Betty and Veronica handle some of Riverdale's unruliest kids? You'll have so much fun reading this book, you won't even notice your parents have left!
name: B&V Friends Adventures In Babysitting

description: Gather around the game board with Archie and friends, it's time for Game Night! Archie, Betty, Jughead and the gang love to share a laugh with some board games, a card game or two, and maybe even some puzzles. It's amazing how much fun (and how much trouble) you can have with a board game! Find out how much the teens of Riverdale have with this 50-page collection, only available digitally!
name: Archie & Friends Game Night

description: When it comes to cooking, Betty's at the front of the class! Her cooking and baking is famous all over Riverdale High, for a good reason. She's so good at it, she can use her cooking to pry Archie away from Veronica! Put on your bib and get ready to get a taste of Betty's cooking with this 100-page digital exclusive. This collection is a recipe so good you'll want seconds!
name: Betty's Kitchen Creations

description: On a dark and stormy night, Archie and his friends scared themselves silly with a bunch of ghost stories! Did you know Riverdale was haunted? Neither did the gang! Steel your nerves and read 50 pages of the silliest, spookiest ghost stories ever told. Are you a 'fraidy cat? Prove it and start reading!
name: Archie & Friends Ghost Stories

description: Sabrina the Teenage Witch has a lot of strange friends! If it's spooky and scary, it's probably been a guest in the Spellman house! Monsters, ghosts, vampires -- they're all real, and a lot friendlier than you think. This special digital exclusive book collects over 150 pages of Sabrina's most monstrous friends. For her, Halloween is every day!
name: Sabrina's Monster Manual

description: Betty, Veronica and the gang have had a lot of really cool pets over the years! Of course you know Betty's cat, Caramel, but have you met Archie's new dog, Vegas? How about Dilton's pet dolphin?! There's over 100 pages of furry fun to be had in this book, so sit! Stay! Read!
name: Betty & Veronica Pet Projects

description: Throughout the years, Archie Comics has always touched on the trends of the time -- pet rocks, hippies, arcades and more! Riverdale has always been timeless, but these stories give a unique look into the past, as only Archie can give! This stroll through American pop culture history is a digital exclusive, and features 70 groovy pages of content. While fads and trends may come and go, the fun you'll have with Archie and friends is forever!
name: Archie Always Trendy

description: Archie's always so clumsy! He can't seem to go for more than a day without tripping, slipping, or flipping over something -- or someone! And now, this autumn (or "Fall," as some call it,) we celebrate our favorite redhead's accident-prone antics. Read this collection of some of Archie's greatest klutzy moments, and see why Archie Andrews falls for Fall!
name: Archie Falls For Fall

description: The fashion princesses of Riverdale High, Betty and Veronica, are trying on all sorts of makeup! They're always on a quest to look their best and try out new styles. Now you can powder your nose with Betty and Veronica in this 150-page digital exclusive collection of the funniest makeup stories!
name: Betty & Veronica Kiss & Makeup

description: Feeling feverish? Bruised and battered? Just plain-ol' run down? Rest up, take your medicine and pass the time with Archie and friends! Archie and the gang, just like the rest of us, are no strangers to getting sick or hurt -- Archie's broken more bones in his body than the average stuntman! Just because you're not feeling great, though, doesn't mean you can't have a little fun. Check out over 100 pages of stories where the gang is under the weather, and see how they cope with it.
name: Get Well Soon, Archie

description: To infinity... and then past it! Blast off with the Archie gang into a collection of outer space adventures! Will they encounter crazy new worlds, nasty alien races, or intergalactic burger places? For Archie, the answer is in the stars! This 100-page digital exclusive collection explores the galaxy as only Archie and friends can. Join the fun today, space cadet!
name: Archie Space Cases

description: It's the holiday season once again, and you know what that means -- SHOPPING! BFFs Betty and Veronica are hitting every store in Riverdale on their quest for the perfect holiday gifts! It can be tough to shop for so many people, but with bargain-hunter Betty and super-rich Veronica on the case, this year will be the best Christmas yet! That is, after some trial and error -- you didn't think they'd get it right on the first try, did you? This digital exclusive collects over 100 pages of merry mishaps as Betty and Veronica screw up -- and then fix -- their holiday shopping experience!
name: Betty & Veronica Holiday Shopping

description: Christmas is right around the corner, and everyone in Riverdale is scrambling to get each other the perfect present! That's a lot easier said than done, especially with Archie and friends! It's the thought that counts, but when Archie gets a really ugly sweater from Veronica, how will he be able to get rid of it without upsetting her? How many times will Betty have to return her Christmas gifts for the gang before she gets it just right? And when Jughead finds out what Archie's getting for the gang, will they jump with joy, or jump him after school?! There are 100 pages of holiday hijinks to enjoy here as you wrap presents for your friends and family. Open your perfect Christmas gift by hitting that Download button now!
name: Archie & Friends Christmas Presents

description: Archie's a lucky guy -- he's gotten to meet the elusive Santa Claus before! How many times? We'll help you count with this 100-page digital exclusive, where Archie and friends share the spotlight with the big man himself! Will St. Nick and our favorite famous redhead work together to bring Christmas to the world? You'd have to see it to believe it!
name: Archie Meets Santa

description: The snow is falling, the carolers are caroling, and Sabrina the Teenage Witch is zapping up some Christmas magic for all her family and friends! The Spellman family does Christmas a little differently --for example, decorating the tree with the powers of levitation is much easier! We'll bet you've never gotten a new magic broom as a gift or shared a glass of eggnog with a werewolf, either! See how magical the holidays can be with this 100-page collection of Sabrina's best Christmas stories.
name: Sabrina's Christmas Magic

description: By popular demand, Archie Comics is proud to present a collection of Josie and the Pussycats' greatest hits! Following in the tradition of Sabrina the Teenage Witch: 50 Magical Stories and The Best of Cheryl Blossom, this super-sized book features some of The Pussycats' most famous and iconic adventures. Follow their rise to stardom from garage band to international superstars, with over 300 pages of stories, pin-ups, and more!
name: The Best of Josie & The Pussycats Greatest Hits

description: Since his first appearance in 1941, Archie Comics have been keeping fans laughing. Now you can read some of those vintage gems in Archie Classics! All of these pages have been lovingly restored for Archie fans old and new. Collecting stories from the 40's and 50's, get a look at some stories that have never been reprinted before. This collection features 150 pages of content and is ONLY available digitally!
name: Archie's Girls Betty & Veronica Classics

description: Betty and Veronica know that the best part of winter is playing in the snow! Join them and the gang as they make snow sculptures, have epic snowball battles and more! This brand new collection features over 100 pages of frosty fun and is only available digitally.
name: B&V Friends Snow Day

description: What would YOU do with $11? The mysterious liaison of Gosford Wobbledon is paying a visit to Riverdale, with a gift of eleven dollars for Archie and his friends. What does it all mean? And more importantly, could a simple $11 change the gang's lives FOREVER?! Find out in this digital-only collection of this bizarre adventure!
name: Archie & Friends Legend of the Elevenaire

description: Archie's taking the ice in this brand new HOCKEY collection! Cheer on the team as they skate through this digital-only collection of stories, all featuring Canada's favorite pastime! Can Archie score the winning goal? You'll have to lace up your skates and find out inside!
name: Archie's Power Play

description: It's time to shred! Bust out your coolest tricks on the slopes with Archie and friends! The gang are strapping on their snowboards and giving you X-TREME winter action in this new digital exclusive collection! Will the gang make it down the mountain in one piece?
name: World of Archie Xtreme Winter

description: It's not easy making a love connection in high school, as Archie, Betty, Veronica and the gang know very well! Even the closest couples mess up every now and then on their dates. We've collected over 150 pages of Riverdale High's greatest dating disasters for you -- hopefully this'll help you learn what NOT to do on your next date!
name: Archie & Friends Dating Disasters

description: Riverdale High is proof that Cupid's arrow will sometimes strike in the least likely of places! There are some pretty weird pairings that have happened over the years, and we're sharing them with you in this digital exclusive. Jughead's on a date?! Veronica and Cheryl are dating a couple of nerds?! Midge is going out with someone other than Moose (and he's letting it happen)?!?! These pairings are just TOO weird -- don't miss this!
name: Archie & Friends Love Is Blind

description: To say that Reggie has a way with the ladies is not entirely false -- he has a way of making them angry! The Clown Prince of Riverdale High brings the ego in this 50-page sampling of Reggie's dating 'skills.' Will he learn from constant rejection and become a real catch? Maybe someday -- for now, though, we'll have to watch him crash and burn!
name: Reggie Riverdale Casanova

description: Duck and cover, Archie's heading to Chemistry class! Archie's a pretty average student, except when it comes to working in the laboratory -- in there, he's a pretty average warhead! Luckily, he's got Dilton and his friends to keep him from blowing up. Check out this collection of scientific stories and let's hope the only lab Archie visits from now on is his dog Vegas!
name: Archie's Laboratory

description: Archie, Jughead and the gang are putting on their funny-looking shoes and heading to the lanes for a few frames of BOWLING! As you can imagine, trusting Archie with something as heavy as a bowling ball is asking for trouble. See what the pin-heads in Riverdale get up to in this digital exclusive collection of bowling stories!
name: Archie Strikes Out

description: Ever notice how not much sleeping happens at a sleepover? Betty and Veronica have -- that's why they're throwing the best sleepover EVER! They'll play games, eat snacks and dish about boys in this super-fun collection, only available digitally! For maximum enjoyment, read while curled up under the covers.
name: Betty & Veronica Sleepover Special

description: Did you know Jughead loves pie? Of course you did -- he loves pretty much everything edible! But he loves pie so much, we've put together a digital exclusive collection for you -- about pies! WOW! What's Jughead's favorite flavor? Probably all of them. This book is delicious!
name: Jughead's Pi Fillers

description: Get ready to RUMBLE! Archie and friends are laying the smackdown in this new digital exclusive! You'll tap out with laughter as the gang jumps into the ring to tell some of our funniest wrestling stories. WHATCHA GONNA DO WHEN ARCHIEMANIA RUNS WILD?!
name: Archie & Friends Wrestle Maniacs

description: Archie and the gang have had it with Reggie's pranks! It's time to get even! This year, Reggie is the April fool with this digital exclusive collection. How will the gang get him? After all, they say you can't trick a trickster! Maybe this won't be as easy as they had hoped...
name: Revenge On Reggie

description: Everyone has a bad day every once in a while, but with someone as clumsy as Archie, they're a little more frequent! From the embarrassing to the painful and a little bit of the in-between, check out what the Riverdale gang considers the worst day ever!
name: Archie & Friends Worst. Day. Ever!

description: As the frontman of The Archies, Riverdale's favorite redhead is definitely a talented singer and guitarist. But when it comes to other instruments, well... In this digital-only book, Archie and his friends try out some new sounds -- and don't always like what they hear! Check out this value-sized collection -- but you might wanna wear earplugs when you do it!
name: Archie's Musical Mess

description: Oh my gosh, it's a barrage of the best battles of the BFFs! Betty and Veronica are squaring off once again in a mle for Archie's heart! This time, though, the gloves are off and they're doing anything it takes to win! Get a front row seat as we look at some of the girls' finest attempts at sabotaging each other. Who will win the war and get the boy? Find out in this mega-sized digital exclusive!
name: Betty vs Veronica Sabotage!

description: Riverdale's mightiest heroes gather in the most Spectacular fashion! Archie, Chuck, Betty and Veronica are powering up and getting ready to save the day! Can they use their Uncanny abilities to stop the forces of evil -- or at least the forces of general teen inconveniences? Check out this Amazing digital-only collection of super stories and find out! Excelsior!
name: The Archie Assembled

description: Take a drive in Archie's run-down ride in this new digital exclusive collection! Even though Archie traded in his battered old jalopy, he hasn't been able to shake his misfortune with cars! Join Archie and the rest of the Riverdale gang in this collection of car catastrophes. Maybe someone should just buy him a bus pass!
name: Archie's Car-Tastrophies

description: It's always important to have something worth fighting for, whether it's an issue as big as equal rights or one as small as a raise in your allowance! The Riverdale kids are no strangers to making their voices heard when they want change. This digital exclusive collects two tales of Archie and friends taking on the establishment -- and each other!
name: Archie Revolution

description: Veronica Lodge is ridiculously rich -- she has an indoor AND outdoor swimming pool, a HUMONGOUS closet stocked with all the trendiest clothing and credit cards with NO credit limit! She'll flaunt it at every opportunity, too -- whether she's helping her friends or buying herself the most extravagant new thing she can come up with! Try to keep up with Veronica and her wealthy family as they single-handedly keep the US economy going!
name: Veronica Daddy's Little Rich Girl

description: Do you know what you want to be when you grow up? Archie and friends aren't quite sure yet, but they've got a lot of ideas! Join Archie, Betty, Veronica and Jughead as they daydream about all the different careers they could have and try to decide what they'd like to do!
name: Archie & Friends When I Grow Up...

description: It's a perfect day for a picnic! Join Betty, Veronica and the gang for some snacks and sandwiches in the great outdoors! This is a digital-only collection, and the perfect reading material to bring along on YOUR picnic!
name: Betty & Veronica Picnic Antics

description: Archie and his pals are getting ready for some home improvement! Join the Riverdale gang in this digital-only collection of painting, sawing, fixing, hammering and more! We're not sure if clumsy Archie is the guy to call when you need your roof patched, though. Will they do more damage than good?
name: Archie & Friends Fixer Upper

description: Betty and Veronica are getting married?! Well, no, not yet -- but they sure are thinking about it! Join the girls in this digital-only collection as they attend, plan and daydream about the special day when they marry that special someone. Will that person be Archie, though? Or someone else..?
name: Betty & Veronica Wedded Blitz

description: Jughead has always marched to the beat of his own drum, but not everyone thinks that's a good thing! Lots of people have tried to change him, and it never seems to work the way they plan! Is Jughead the nut that nobody can crack? Find out in this digital-only collection and watch Jughead face off with the entire WORLD!
name: Jughead vs the World

description: You can't kiss THIS cook -- he won't let you! Jughead's manning the grill in this digital-only collection of stories. Ol' Needlenose has a bunch of recipes he'd like to try! Get to the table quick, though, or he'll eat it all first!
name: Jughead Grill Master

description: The Riverdale Shore is about to see the wildest party ever! Betty, Veronica and the gang are taking over the beach in this DOUBLE-SIZED digital exclusive collection. With all the sun, surf and swimsuits, it sounds like a paradise! Put on some sunscreen and join us!
name: B&V Friends Beach Bash

description: Something's fishy around here... It must be a new Digital Exclusive! Archie and friends are gathering up their poles and tackle boxes and heading to the water for some nice, relaxing fishing. Although when the Riverdale gang is involved, it's probably not going to be so relaxing, is it? See if these flukes can reel in a whopper, or if they end up all wet!
name: Archie Hook, Line and Sinker

description: Surf's up, brah! Wax your board and hit the waves in this new digital exclusive! Archie, Betty, Veronica and the rest of the Riverdale gang are going out to hang ten in this new collection. Can they stay afloat, or will they wipe out? You'll have to read to find out, dude!
name: World of Archie Wipeout!

description: Swimming's a lot of fun, but if you're not careful, you could end up in big trouble! That's where Betty and Veronica come in -- they're Riverdale's best lifeguards and they're ready for action in this digital-only collection! Between the pool and the beach, they'll have their hands full. Can they save everyone in time?
name: Betty & Veronica Lifeguards On Duty

description: YEE-HAW! It's time to wrangle up Archie and his pals for this new digital exclusive collection! This time, the gang is moseying around in the Ol' West, roping cattle and having milkshakes down at the saloon. Can the gang protect the town from the rowdy outlaws that wanna run this town?
name: Archie & Friends Wacky Wild West
